input.sentences: this is a picture of a clearing .
this is an empty outdoors scene .
this is a picture of a pond .
this is a picture of a lake .
this is a picture of an ocean .
output.sentences: The girl got out of her car to take a picture of the clearing.
She took in the scene, the big, empty outdoors.
She turned to her left and took a picture of the pond before getting in her car.
After driving for a while, she stopped and took a picture of a lake.
She drove for another hour or so before reaching her final destination and taking a picture: the ocean.
